channel.title: SOCMINT on CyberKoopas
channel.description: Recent content in SOCMINT on CyberKoopas

item.title: [Midnight final] Osint - Esnarcotrafiquants
item.description: 1/5 One of our pilots has been missing for 5 days, our investigation has had no results, but we still have a lead. We know he has a son, and it's possible that he can tell us more about his father. He's apparently very active on a social network - his name should be idrisrsbel7. Format : MCTF{} To begin this investigation we have an username : idrisrsbel7 Our first objectives is to find Idris Father’s .

item.title: [Hackday final] Osint - My runaway daughter
item.description: ![[CTFs/Hackday-final/Osint/Pasted image 20230619135704.png]] This SOCMINT Osint challenge start with this post that gave us the Facebook profile of the missing daughter. ![[CTFs/Hackday-final/Osint/Pasted image 20230619161123.png]] On her profile nothing except her name and a picture. By googling her name we can find her LinkedIn. ![[CTFs/Hackday-final/Osint/Pasted image 20230619161354.png]] One of her LinkedIn post we can find her resume link on a Google Drive. ![[CTFs/Hackday-final/Osint/Pasted image 20230512194624.png]] Inspecting the element of the web page of the drive, we can find a crucial information to continue our investigation her email : julie.

item.title: [Midnight qualif] Osint - Time Traveler
item.description: 1/3 It is said that a time traveler is roaming the social networks right now... his username? "ibm_5100_" Find out more about this person. Let’s dig this username using WhatsMyName : ![[/CTFs/Midnight-qualif/Osint/1.png]] It’s fit the description about a time traveler. But nothing more… ![[/CTFs/Midnight-qualif/Osint/2.png]] Since we know it’s linked to time travel, let’s use WaybackMachine to dig the past of this twitter account : ![[/CTFs/Midnight-qualif/Osint/3.png]] we found one archive with on it the first flag : !
